attributes.action: Free Vote on issues raised by E-Petitions
attributes.additional_details:
To ensure full democracy issues raised by E-Petitions and debated in Parliament should be decided by a free vote.
This should prevent Parties from instructing MP's on how to vote and allow for a proper debate on issues raised.
This would encourage people to take more interest in Politics and feel less disenfranchised.

rejection.details: Whipping is a matter for political parties and not HM Government
